referral_content_code: Copy this referral code and share it to invite a friend and claim more profit.
referral_content_no_code:
Generate a unique referral code and share it to invite a friend and claim more profit.
The more friends join the league with your referral code, the more you earn, even if you don't win!
for_example:
For example, if you invite 10 friends out of 100 users that joined using a referral code, you will be able to claim 10% of the prize pool portion reserved for referrals.
See estimated reward detail to know more
